definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: ([[חִֽקלָָג]] 1Sa 27:6 a +, [[חִֽקְלָâג]] 2Sa 2:1 [[חִיקְêלָג]] 1Ch 12:1);—assigned to Judah Jos 15:31, to Simeon Jos 19:5; Philistine city given to David 1Sa 27:6, 1Sa 27:6, 1Sa 30:1, 1Sa 30:1, 1Sa 30:1, 1Sa 30:14, 1Sa 30:26, 2Sa 1:1, 2Sa 4:10, 1Ch 4:30, 1Ch 12:1, 1Ch 12:21 (van d. H. v:20); Sekelak, Sikelag, etc.; usually identified with Zuheilikah, 19 miles SW from Bêt Jibrin, 11 miles ESE. from Gaza (cf. Buhl:Geogr. 185).
